subject: Re: What if we dont name any methods as testXXXX() in junits. What it will run-i
msgSnippet: ... Why wouldn t you?  That s the definition of a test method: public void testXXXX() ... The framework won t be able to automatically discover and collect
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Ashutosh Sharma <ashutosh.sharma@o...>
wrote:
> What if we dont name any methods as testXXXX() in junits.

Why wouldn't you? That's the definition of a test method:

public void testXXXX()

> What it will run-i am suppossing that compilation will succeed-what
> will happen at runTime?

The framework won't be able to automatically discover and collect your
tests.

Dave
